Pointing gesture by the woman suggesting knowledge or a tip

THUMBNAIL-TITLE RELATIONSHIP.visual_reinforcement: Both the thumbnail and the title emphasize instructional massage techniques and promise a rejuvenating or growth-related benefit. The hand and pointing gesture visually connect to the 'massage' instruction in the title.
THUMBNAIL-TITLE RELATIONSHIP.contrasts_mismatches: Thumbnail text focuses specifically on increasing 'height and width,' while the title alludes more broadly to feeling youthful in old age ('बुढ़ापे में जवानी का एहसास'). There’s a mild mismatch: the thumbnail narrows the topic to physical dimensions, while the title is more general and emotive.
